Rule.name: New Field Value
Rule.Description: This rule can be used to generate a field value (eg - an account name) using data from the given Identity.

Argument.Description: The Identity object that represents the user needing the field value.

Rule.Source: /******* * * * Generated: Wed Feb 14 13:45:54 EST 2018 * * Rule: Field Value Template * * Description: Field Value Template * * Inputs: * * identity - The Identity object that represents the user needing the field value. * * Returns: * * value - The string value created. * ******/ serilog=org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory.getLog("SERI.Rule.fieldValueTemplate"); serilog.debug("----Rule Start----");
